content: सत्त्रं [सद्-ष्ट्रन्] (usually written सत्रं) {@--1@} A sacrificial session, especially one lasting from 13 to 100 days. {@--2@} A sacrifice in general. {@--3@} An oblation, offering, or gift. {@--4@} Liberality, munificence. {@--5@} Virtue. {@--6@} A house, residence. {@--7@} Covering. {@--8@} Wealth. {@--9@} A wood, forest; <ls>Ki. 13. 9.</ls> {@--10@} A tank, pond. {@--11@} Fraud, cheating. {@--12@} A place of refuge, asylum, covert.
